## Summary

## Problem / Motivation
Why this is needed.
What limitation, usability issue, or gap currently exists for users or the system.

## Goal

Describe the outcome, not the solution.

## Acceptance criteria

- [ ] Another concrete condition (behavior or UI state)
- [ ] No vague or subjective criteria
